Package index

Main plot functions

Build basic plots

roboplot()
Comprehensive plotly wrapper function
robotable()
Comprehensive DT wrapper function
robomap()
Comprehensive leaflet wrapper function

Set plotting parameters

Helper functions to change the appearance of plots

set_roboplot_options()
Global configuration of various roboplotr outputs
set_artefacts()
Visualization export configuration
set_axes()
Axis configuration
set_border()
Plot border configuration
set_caption()
Caption configuration
set_confidence_interval()
Configure Confidence Display
set_errorbars()
Error bar configuration
set_font()
Font configuration.
set_grid()
Grid configuration.
set_heatmap()
Heatmap configuration.
set_hovertext()
Hovertext configuration
set_imgdl_layout()
Font configuration for modebar exports.
set_infobox()
Info box configuration for roboplot() or robotable()
set_labels()
Label configuration.
set_legend() set_plot_legend() set_map_legend()
Legend configuration
set_locale()
Locale configuration
set_markers()
Marker configuration
set_modebar()
Modebar configuration
set_pattern()
Pattern configuration.
set_robotable_labels()
Table label configuration
set_shadearea()
Shade configuration
set_title()
Title configuration.
set_updatemenu()
Set up an update menu for a plot
set_zeroline()
Zeroline configuration
set_zoom()
Zooming configuration

Utils

create_widget()
Export visualizations to various formats
